title: Indian Head Resort
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. New Hampshire's White Mountains hotel restaurant, whose dinner menu, while meat-based, includes a several vegetarian dishes: a grilled tofu vegetable dish, a black bean burger, a pasta primavera, and you could ask for vegan cheese on pizza. Reported the owners' daughter is vegan, inspiring them to create vegan options. Overlooks a lakeside landscape surrounded by the mountains.
